hero.title: Grow with Tálamo
hero.subtitle: Earn by sharing
hero.description: When someone joins Exness with your agent link, they automatically validate their email to access Tálamo, and you receive 50% of our IB commissions.

problem.title: The problem with traditional referrals
problem.point1: Empty promises with no real value for your followers
problem.point2: Generic links that provide nothing beyond a click
problem.point3: Opaque commissions without transparency or reports

difference.title: What makes this program different
difference.subtitle: It's not just a link. It's real access.

point1.title: Instant verified access
point1.description: Anyone using your link registers on Exness and automatically validates their email to enter Tálamo. No extra steps.

point2.title: Transparent and direct commission
point2.description: Exness pays you 50% of what Tálamo receives as IB. No intermediaries, no delays. Real-time reports.

point3.title: Backed by an official partner
point3.description: Tálamo is an official Exness Introducing Broker. This isn't generic affiliation: it's a regulated program with verifiable commissions.

step1.title: 1. Generate your link
step1.description: One click. Get your unique Exness agent link connected to Tálamo.

step2.title: 2. Share it
step2.description: Your referral registers on Exness with your link and automatically validates their email for Tálamo.

step3.title: 3. Earn per trade
step3.description: For each lot your referral trades, Exness pays IB commission. You receive 50%.

example.title: Calculation example
example.setup: Your referral opens a Standard account and trades 10 lots of EURUSD in a month.
example.commission: Exness base IB commission: ~$10 USD per lot (40% of typical spread)
example.note: This is a simplified calculation. Commissions vary by account type, spread, and volume. Exness reports everything in real-time.

benefit1.title: 50% real commission
benefit1.description: Not 5%. Not 10%. 50% of what Tálamo receives as IB for your referrals.

benefit2.title: No earning limits
benefit2.description: No cap. The more active referrals, the more you earn. Scalable without restrictions.

benefit3.title: Real-time reports
benefit3.description: Direct access to Exness reports. See every trade, every commission, without delays.

benefit4.title: Automatic payments
benefit4.description: Exness deposits directly into your agent account. Daily. Automatic. No manual requests.

why.title: Why this program exists
why.point1: Tálamo grows when its community grows. Every person who enters and uses the tools professionally strengthens the ecosystem.
why.point2: We want those who share Tálamo to do so because they believe in the project, not because they need one more click.
why.point3: That's why we share 50% of commissions: if you grow by helping others enter, Tálamo grows with you.

cta.title: Start now
cta.description: One click. Your link. Your opportunity to grow with Tálamo.

q1.question: Do I need to be a trader to participate?
q1.answer: No. You just need to share the link. Your referrals are the ones who trade.

q2.question: How much do I earn exactly?
q2.answer: 50% of the IB commission that Tálamo receives from Exness for each trade by your referrals. The base commission varies by account type and spread. Exness reports everything in real-time.

q3.question: How do I get paid?
q3.answer: Exness deposits directly into your agent account. Automatic daily payments. You don't have to request anything.

q4.question: Is there a referral limit?
q4.answer: No. You can refer as many people as you want.

q5.question: What if my referral stops trading?
q5.answer: You only earn when they trade. If they stop, no commission. If they resume trading, you resume earning.
